title: Aromatherapy Personals Energy Boost | Nuworld Botanicals
sitename: Nuworld Botanicals | A fun DIY store I Birthday Parties I Workshops I Candle Making
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Personals Energy Boost The oils in our Energy Boost blend contains essential oils that are believed to be revitalizing and uplifting, helping you to feel more alert. Includes Peppermint, Rosemary, Lemon and other revitalizing essential oils. Infused with superfruit anti-oxidants this nutrient-enriched oil blend nourishes skin with Vitamins A, B, C & E while stimulating the senses instantly. To Use: Massage onto pulse point areas of the skin- back of neck (or just below ears), inside wrists or temples. Breathe in the gentle aroma for an overall sense of well-being and restoration. 100% Naturally Active Aromatherapy. Size: 9.6 Ingredients: Simmondsia arvensis officinalis (rosemary) leaf oil, Citrus medica limonum (lemon) peel oil, (Eucalyptus) globules oil, seed oil, Hippophae rhamnoides (seabuckthorn) oil, Tocopherol (vitamin e).
